SEARCH
Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode

Class AR_Joint

java.lang.Object
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.AR_Joint
public class AR_Joint extends Object
This class create a AR_Joint object that is used to encapsulate all the code used to control and use the 2024-2025 Aerospace Robotics Robot Arm Joint. Instantiate that class for each AR_Joint in the AR_Arm object. Creation Date: 11/3/2024

  • Constructor Details

    • AR_Joint

      public AR_Joint(com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode iBot, String iJointName, double iP, double iI, double iD, double iF)
      Constructor. Prepare a joint instance.
      Parameters:
      iBot - Handle to the LinearOpMode.
      iJointName - text based name of joint motor in robot configuration.
      iP - variable of PID controller.
      iI - variable of PID controller.
      iD - variable of PID controller.
      iF - variable for use with feed forward in PID controller.

  • Method Details

    • moveJoint

      public void moveJoint(int target, int iCurrentState, int iLastState)
      Move joint to the desired target.
      Parameters:
      target - degree angle to move the joint to.
